body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to CarQuest. My name is Eric Rogers. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Melissa. Can you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Melissa. We also require your email address. Could you provide that information?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, we have your phone number as five five five one two three four and your email address as melissaclark@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Melissa, for sharing that information with us. We will contact you shortly with further details.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Eric, I'm excited to hear back from you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We appreciate your enthusiasm, Melissa. Thank you for your time. Have a great day!
